resources.string: The seed phrase cannot be empty.
The seed phrase length is invalid. It must be one of the following: %s.
Each word in the provided seed phrase must be from the BIP-39 list. Please check again to ensure a valid seed phrase.
Mnemonic phrase checksum doesn\'t match. Make sure all words are correct and in the appropriate sequence.
The provided passphrase does not meet the security requirements.
The encrypted seed phrase cannot be empty.
Decryption process timed out. Please try again.
Failed to decode the colored seed phrase. Please verify the input and try again. \n\n\u2022 Cause: %s.
Failed to encrypt the seed phrase. Please verify the input and try again. \n\n\u2022 Cause: %s.
Failed to decrypt the seed phrase. Please verify the input and try again. \n\n\u2022 Cause: %s.
An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again. \n\n\u2022 Cause: %s.
The colored seed phrase cannot be empty.
The format of the colored seed phrase is invalid. It must contain either 8 or 16 colors.
The colored seed phrase contains invalid hexadecimal color values.
The color sequence doesn\'t match the order of your seed phrase. Please check and ensure each color correctly represents the words of your seed phrase in sequence.
Unable to proceed. Please check the passphrase or any other details provided, and try again.
Invalid mnemonic. Length must be 12/24 words or decimals between [1â€“2048]
